name: Pixence
description:
Pixence is my submission for the LÖVE Jam 2018.

Story
You, a very brave knight, are trying to rescue the last few villager in the castle, while a horde of raider attack. But the swordsmen, archer, dark knights and even the mighty wizard don't want you to leave!

Controls
Keyboard or a Xbox Controller
Move up and down with W/S or the D-pad
Attack with J, K and l or X, A and B
Depending on the enemy, you have to choose the correct attack, watch out for the hints at the wall!
